channel.title: Trying to Teach Myself Pixel Art, Looking for Tips
channel.description:
[img]http://sc-cdn.scaleengine.net/i/29932799a692bfd064633fa082f5c755.png[/img] [img]http://sc-cdn.scaleengine.net/i/aacf34312e5075e305a1ebc8044a3e37.png[/img] [img]http://sc-cdn.scaleengine.net/i/e1eac8c56b8a77ba856fdbb46a4c06fd.png[/img]
The above images are the same thing in front of different backgrounds, it's probably the best looking thing I've made thus far, since I've been trying to learn the ways of the pixels. I'm looking for tips on how to improve this, and pixel art tips in general to help me make them for my games.

item.title: Trying to Teach Myself Pixel Art, Looking for Tips
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

The wings look a bit weird (too short, too sharp or something, hard to place), but besides that they look really good. You should make a gif of it by just adjusting the jet pixel alphas/colors and post that

Read full topic
item.source: Trying to Teach Myself Pixel Art, Looking for Tips
